1.text: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

2.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

4.text: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

5.text: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

6.text: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:

7.text: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.

8.text: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.

9.text: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

10.text: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.

11.text: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

12.text: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:

13.text: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:

15.text: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

16.text: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;

17.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

18.text: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;

19.text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

20.text: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,

21.text: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;

22.text: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,

23.text: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

24.text: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

25.text: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;

26.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

27.text: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

28.text: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelled in Jerusalem.

29.text: And at Gibeon dwelled the father of Gibeon; whose wife’s name was Maachah:

30.text: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

31.text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.

32.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelled with their brothers in Jerusalem, over against them.

33.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

34.text: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.

35.text: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

36.text: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,

37.text: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:

38.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

39.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

40.text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor, archers, and had many sons, and sons’ sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
